CustomField.description: List of API names of assignment fields to display as columns on the Project/Assignment lookup in the enhanced Time Entry page. Do not include the pse__ namespace prefix in the API name of a field. The default value is Name, Nick_Name__c.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: List of API names of assignment fields to display as columns on the Project/Assignment lookup in the enhanced Time Entry page. Do not include the pse__ namespace prefix in the API name of a field. The default value is Name, Nick_Name__c.
CustomField.label: Assignment lookup columns
